name: Who is God?
description:
Who is God?

God is good.

-

Contains secret bonus content. If you're looking for an expansive, in-depth rpg, you've come to the wrong place. May or may not contain triggering dialogue regarding child abuse and religious trauma based on personal experiences.

-

This game is free to anyone, do not send me money because you played. I am not looking to profit off of my personal trauma. Thank you for understanding.
